bibl.title: Rome and the Ptolemies of Egypt. The Development of their Political Relations 273-80 B.C.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of Oulu. - I. Sources and the Historical Background. - II. The Far-away Friends. - III. Rome as a Champion of Ptolemy V Epiphanes. - IV. The Saviour of Egypt. - V. A Protector without a Protégé - Rome and Ptolemaic Dynastic Rivalry during the Reign of Ptolemy VI. - VI. A Protégé without a Protector. - Conclusions. - Appendices. Bibliography. Index.
bibl.seg: LAMPELA Anssi, Rome and the Ptolemies of Egypt. The Development of their Political Relations 273-80 B.C. (Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 111, 1998.)
Helsinki, Societas Scientiarum Fennica, 1998, 8°, vii-301 pp. ISBN 951-653-295-0.

Diss. Univ. of Oulu. - I. Sources and the Historical Background. - II. The Far-away Friends. - III. Rome as a Champion of Ptolemy V Epiphanes. - IV. The Saviour of Egypt. - V.
